Edit Palette Item Name Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select Tools»Advanced»Edit Palette Set to display the Edit Controls and Functions Palette Set dialog box. Right-click the palette and select Rename Subpalette or Edit Short Name from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box. You also can display this dialog box by right-clicking the palette and selecting Insert»Subpalette from the shortcut menu to display the Insert Subpalette dialog box, selecting Create a new palette file, clicking the OK button, entering a filename, and clicking the Save button.

Use this dialog box to name a new subpalette, rename a subpalette, or configure the text labels that appear below each icon when the format of the palette is Icons and Text.

This dialog box includes the following component:

  • Enter a name for this palette item—Enter the name of the palette item.
